name: Oyasumi Tomodachi (Incomplete) Shooter
description:
Oyasumi Tomodachi Shooter is a game concept for #agbic (A Game by its Cover)

In it, you play as a witch who is trying to rid the world of bad dreams and nightmares. Your wand shoots nice dreams toward the nightmares. Counter the nightmares with nice dreams so the world can sleep easy!

This is a standard vertical shooter with a cute concept.

Created starting August 2nd for the jam using this cover: http://famicase.com/16/softs/139.html
